member_organisations:
We have 22 member organisations from 18 countries.  
http://dystonia-europe.org/about-us/members/
fields_of_interest: Research and innovation, Public Health, Communication
eu_initiatives: We follow EU initiatives within the field of health, communication and research.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: We are the non-profit European Platform for all dystonia stakeholders in Europe.  Our mission is to promote awareness and education, stimulate research for better treatments, and ultimately to find a cure, in order to improve the quality of life for people living with dystonia.   Our members consist of 22 national member associations from 18 European countries, which represent approximately 15 000 dystonia patients in Europe. Dystonia Europe was founded in 1993.
